text: a certain worthy man who was twice married
the sole heir of his father 's goods
the first vagrant who comes in with a brown face and a ragged coat
a small , weazened old woman , who was trying to lift a bundle of sticks on to her back
a certain place on the outskirts of the forest
a good - humoured , fellow who showed him the way , and pointed out everything of interest on the road
three beautiful ladies who were the king 's daughters
the man who shall find the crown jewels
the man who should fetch down the moon for her to play with
